name: Real Time Messenger
description: In development of an independent web application that facilitates instantaneous inter-user communication through mobile devices. The platform encompasses contact synchronization to enable frictionless message transmission, all presented within an intuitively accessible interface, ensuring a refined and immersive user experience

name: BeFit Native Fitness
description: Created a native application for Android and Apple (iOS) with a team of 5. Users can track daily fitness metrics leveraging native device Health APIs. Users can create individual accounts using credentials. Ability to display individualized health metrics in the dashboard.

name: Face Verification Model
description: Developed a deep learning model with 9 layers, including 2 convolution layers, to perform binary classification of images by recognizing the user’s face in an image, specifically used in conjunction with ‘Tello’ drone for prediction purposes.

name: Virtual Store Web App
description: Created a web application with a team of 2. Users can browse, write reviews for items and post their own for others to review. Required to design and implement the database schema to the requirements. Followed a structured approach, designing and implementing a database schema with tables to efficiently store and manage user information, item details, and reviews within the application.
